alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, eastern Fort Bend, north central Brazoria and south central Harris Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sunnyside, or near Astrodome Area, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Pasadena, Pearland, northern Friendswood, South Houston, Manvel, Greater Eastwood, Greater Hobby Area, Clear Lake, Greater Third Ward, Second Ward, Astrodome Area, South Belt / Ellington, Macgregor, University Place, Downtown Houston, Brookside Village, Golfcrest / Bellfort / Reveille, Westbury, Braeswood and South Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Harris; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
